lines.text:
[trying to start a fire with two sticks]
This is impossible!
Keep going. It's how man first made fire.
Well that just shows you how great men are. If a woman had created this is would be a lot easier!

[Watching Pam and her family coming]
You're daughter better watch out, my son's a real ladies man.
Yeah haven't you heard I'm a "real ladies man"

[Watching Quentin eat a bug]
Oh narly!
